data.Name: Global Wind Energy Council (GWEC)
data.Tagline: The Global Wind Energy Council is the international trade association for the wind power industry, representing the united voice of the industry, globally.
data.About: GWEC is a member-based trade association that represents the entire wind energy sector. The members of GWEC represent over 1,500 companies, organisations and institutions in more than 80 countries, including manufacturers, developers, component suppliers, research institutes, national wind and renewables associations, electricity providers, finance and insurance companies.
